description: During a ceremony in Dublin on Sunday, the pope asked forgiveness for sexual abuses committed by members of the Roman Catholic clergy in the country.
title: Pope Francis Asks Forgiveness for Abuses in Ireland
title_page: Pope Francis Asks Forgiveness for Abuses in Ireland - Video - NYTimes.com
text: During a ceremony in Dublin on Sunday, the pope asked forgiveness for sexual abuses committed by members of the Roman Catholic clergy in the country.
